definition: Xintiandi (shopping, eating and entertainment district of Shanghai)
abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: All the sites I chose for this article broke new ground in this area.
sentences.chinese: 本文中挑选的所有站点都在业内开拓了新天地。

sentences.english: Xintiandi hasn't been around for a decade yet and already it is a Shanghai icon.
sentences.chinese: 新天地建成还不到十年，但已经是上海的地标。

sentences.english: The Langham Xintiandi stands as the gateway to Shanghai's entertainment scene.
sentences.chinese: 朗廷新天地站为上海的娱乐场景的门户。

sentences.english: The Site of First National Congress of CPC and Xintiandi are the best representative Shikumen-style complexes.
sentences.chinese: 石库门建筑群以一大会址和新天地为代表。

sentences.english: In Shanghai, all roads lead to Xintiandi.
sentences.chinese: 在上海，条条大路通新天地。

sentences.english: Many organizations that have adopted Agile are breaking new ground with their software development.
sentences.chinese: 许多已经采用敏捷的公司正在开辟软件开发的新天地。

sentences.english: New world order to its new position and acting, rewritten Shikumen history.
sentences.chinese: 新天地，以它新的姿势和神髓，重写了石库门的历史。

sentences.english: The architecture of Xintiandi is very ordinary.
sentences.chinese: 新天地的结构非常普通。

sentences.english: The whole complex has become an outstanding spot with its exterior retaining the Shikumen architectural style.
sentences.chinese: 它成为了以石库门建筑为外立面的新天地的一大亮点。

sentences.english: Natter says the museum is breaking new ground.
sentences.chinese: 南特说博物馆在这里开辟了新天地。

sentences.english: A Coach will provide you a new perspective and he see you from an achiever’s perspective.
sentences.chinese: 教练可以带给你一片新天地。

sentences.english: Jinlong discovers Zhu Guanzhong is heavily in debt and intends to use the Xintiandi project to swindle money.
sentences.chinese: 金龙发现朱冠中欠债累累并意图利用新天地计划行骗。

definition: Nanjing St., large commercial street in Shanghai
outlets (loanword)/retail outlet (e.g. specializing in seconds of famous brands)/factory outlet retail store
shopping mall/shopping center/department store/emporium/CL:家[jia1]/the business world
